So yesterday  ReactConf  started with the opening keynote of Sophie Alpert and Dan Abramov about “React Today and Tomorrow”.
Dan introduced…
markdownRemark.html: So yesterday ReactConf started with the opening keynote of Sophie Alpert and Dan Abramov about “React Today and Tomorrow”. Dan introduced Hooks, which is currently in React v16.7.0-alpha and in a RFC status.
